abilities.description: Luffy grabs an opponent (in this case, Momoo the sea cow) and spins them around rapidly like a pinwheel, using the opponent's body as a weapon to strike multiple enemies in a sweeping attack.
abilities.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's creativity in using his rubber abilities to turn opponents and the environment into weapons rather than relying solely on direct attacks. This technique effectively eliminated most of the Arlong Pirates' lower-ranking members in a single move.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Kazaguruma Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Kazaguruma technique, using Momoo as a spinning weapon to defeat numerous fish-men.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of the Gomu Gomu no Mi and Luffy's combat creativity.

keyMoments.title: Devil Fruit Weakness Exploited
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Devil Fruit weakness (inability to swim) becomes a critical plot point when Arlong throws him into the pool to drown.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces the fundamental vulnerability all Devil Fruit users share and creates the episode's main crisis.
